attributes.action: Create a new day of the week called PoppleDayNoon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: PoppleDayNoon will start at 23:15 on Tuesday night and will end at 01:05 on Wednesday evening. PoppledayNoon will be a new day of the week when everyone has to smile and be happy. Talking about the credit crunch or the global recession will not be accepted.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
